jd: From: Raj Khan, Convextech inc. raj@convextech.com Reply to: raj@convextech.com Hi,Hope you are doing good.!!Please let me know if you are interested in the below position.!! Position: HRIS Project ManagerLocation: Houston, TX Hybrid. Duration: 6-12MonthsVisa: Only USC/GC/EADInterview: Video Job Description: PROJECT MANAGER (Global People/Information Systems) Seeking a Project Manager - People/HR Systems to lead the implementation of akey HR (Human Resources) project. This project will include implementation of a new pay equity solution; significantly expanding onboarding with an existing people solution, etc. The project manager will lead and manage a project delivery team with clear purpose and goals. Fostering and maintaining stakeholder relationships, communicating plans, risks, blockers, turning points and opportunities.Ensure project is delivered on time, within budget and project scope.Monitor budgets and resourcesProviding project status updates in accordance with the governance framework Skills/Requirements: Expertise in delivering projects within a global or multi-national organizationExpertise managing complex HCM/HRIS projects that include integration, regulatory consideration and data uplift.Strong budget management, project controlsAble to engage, influence and build strong working relationshipsExperience in project management methodologies to include Agile, Waterfall Thanks and Regards MD.
